definition: to test a random sample/to spot-check
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: Conclusion The product quality can be effectively promoted through supervision.
sentences.chinese: 結論監督抽驗可以有效地改善藥包材產品的質量狀況。

sentences.english: The former is conducted for understanding overall quality status of medical devices and the latter for supervising quality of medical devices.
sentences.chinese: 監督性抽驗是指爲監督醫療器械質量所進行的抽驗。

sentences.english: The former is conducted for understanding overall quality status of medical devices and the latter for supervising quality of medical devices.
sentences.chinese: 監督性抽驗是指爲監督醫療器械質量所進行的抽驗。

sentences.english: We sampled the stuff and found it satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 我們抽驗了這批材料，認爲滿足。

sentences.english: Objective The impact factors on percentage of total testing in supervised sampling were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響監督抽驗全檢率的因素。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT : Objective In order to further improve and perfect the "Random Inspection of Nation-wide Drug Evaluation".
sentences.chinese: 目的進一步改進和完善“國家評價抽驗”工作。

definition: to detect/to examine and discover/to sense
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
